sense.def: Illness Sign of a pain associated with a feeling as if one were being tugged. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 7: 又療 胸膈滿塞，心背撮痛，走注氣悶。宜服此柴胡湯方 , “Also, to cure a feeling of fullness and blockage in the region of chest and diaphragm, with a tugging pain affecting the heart and back, and with qi pouring in and causing heart-pressure, the recipe to ingest the decoction with chai hu is advisable”.
